name: Blob (itch) (Ddollz)
description:
Hello! This is my 2nd game jam(United Game Jam) and 4th game that i made. I used unity

Theme: two
The Idea of the game is when the player jumps it adds 100 to the score and when the player gets hits by a bullet the bullet splits into two the bullets also split into two when the 1 min countdown is done, the player only has 10 lifes

How To Play: (Its better to play on .EXE or fullscreen)
Left Click anywhere to jump/dodge the bullet

All asset were mine but not the music and the font

Credits to the music:
Clockwise Orchestral By super noot ensemble
Come Listen With Me By super noot ensemble
Memo By super noot ensemble

Font: https://www.dafont.com/minecraft.font
